<p></p>


<div class="promotext">
<p>Celebrating its 20th Anniversary season in 2024, Fort Lauderdale’s Revolution Live has been living the music in South Florida since 2004. Acts such as Lady Gaga, The Weeknd, Katy Perry, and Paramore played the rock clubâ€™s legendary stage for an intimate audience before they broke out as stars; artists of all genres, from punk to rap to metal, regularly perform at the unapologetically bold venue.</p>
<p>Winner of the Broward-Palm Beach & Miami New Times 2018 â€œBest of Miamiâ€ Awards for Best Rock Club, Revolution hosted sold out shows from Sum 41, Artic Monkeys, John Legend, Rancid, Flatbush Zombies, Kali Uchis, BÃ˜RNS, and an unforgettable secret concert from indie rock legends The Pixies. Revolution Live is bringing up-and-coming stars Vince Staples, Kurt Vile, and Ella Mai to its stage.</p>
<p>Revolution Live has hosted an extensive portfolio of private & corporate events, including birthday parties, bar & bat mitzvahs, banquets, and more. The venue, along with the entire Damn Good Hospitality family, is committed to its position in the community as an influential advocate for philanthropy and local support.</p>
</div>			</div><!-- .entry-content -->
